title: In Regards to my 14 day suspension
body:
Hi All.
On a starting note, This does NOT discredit my behaviour, I take full responsibility for the level of toxicity I have shown, and I can't blame them for acting out against me, But I don't see why it was this harsh.
I just bought an IP boost, because I wanted to get the new champion, all was well and I was about 3000 IP off, but out of nowhere I get a 14 Day Suspension, Now it isn't because I got the suspension, it's because I have never been notified or chat suspended prior, and the ban is a hefty ban for someone who has to go to school and work. 
All I am asking is if anyone could clear up a reason as to why my ban was put out after no prior notice, because it doesn't seem unjust, it just seems a little out of the blue
Regards, WhyDoUWannaKnow

replies.body: Depending on what was said or why you were reported, it's entirely possible to [**skip certain levels of punishment**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286#h1q2). I don't want to give out your personal chat logs from the games that were flagged, but you're welcome to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where we can go over everything in detail with you.
